item.title: Room and coroutines testing
item.author: Author
item.description: My last article covered some simple example about Room and RxJava instrumentation testing code. Coroutines also have great support in unit testing even though todays topic has nothing to do with it. What I mean is that we are not going to cover runBlockingTest this time. Android doesn’t support that (correct me if I’m wrong please) yet. However, I could schedule a topic about that because it really makes me excited.
